category.name: Product Structure.Configurator Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSEConfiguratorFeaturePropertyMapping
preference.preference_description: Indicates for what Occ Notes or Property on which mapped properties are authored, so that the system reads the mapped properties and displays the corresponding feature selection for each corresponding configured BOMlines.For example, the preference value can be AIE_OCC_NAME. The mapped property exmaples are bl_occurrence_name=[Teamcenter]family1 bl_quantity=[Teamcenter]family2
